metadata.title: USN-4821-1 -- openpyxl vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that openpyxl incorrectly handled certain documents. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service or other unspecified impact.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4821-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python-openpyxl - 2.3.0-1ubuntu0.1~esm1 python3-openpyxl - 2.3.0-1ubuntu0.1~esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
